About.Hours & facilities: Open Monday to Friday 10am-4pm; closed on public holidays.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit required. Proof of identity required. Closed period of 30 years applies to most records.

About.Acquisition focus: Records created (principally) within police stations which document the work of the Victoria Police.

About.Major holdings:
Victoria Police Station records
	Police Gazettes
	Records of Conduct 
	and Service of Victoria Police Members from 1853

Contact.Note: Formally known as the Victoria Police Historical Unit
